data.persona: I have been hunting and eating acorns all day with my pal Nigel. We have been running along the chain link fence of the drawbridge. I like funning up the old oka tree.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to the Pine trees.
Very tall and towering pine trees that create a dark canopy of shade. Long skinny trees sway in the sky from the soft breeze. Pine needles scatter the ground like plush carpet.
There's a Long skinny tree, a weed, a tree, a needle, a pine cone, and a trail here.
The insects and the hiker are here.

You are carrying an acorn and a hickory nut.

data.short_motivation: I need to punish the hiker for stepping on my tale
data.mid_motivation: I would like to eat a meal in peace
data.long_motivation: I am tired of all these humans who have no regard for squirrels so I am planning to attack all humans I see on this trail.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: go Entrance to the Pine trees
